content.new:
I am following the [subt\_hello\_world docker tutorial](https://bitbucket.org/jgrogers/subt_hello_world/wiki/Docker%20Installation).

‌

All worked well until I got to the ‘Utilize the "helloworld\_devel" container for development’ section.

‌

The image runs OK, using the first step:

./run.bash helloworld\_devel ~/subt\_hello\_world/catkin\_base\_ws ~/subt\_hello\_world/catkin\_build\_ws cd ~/workspaces/catkin\_base\_ws/src

But the wstool update fails due to permissions:

developer@desktop:~$ cd ~/workspaces/catkin\_base\_ws/src

developer@desktop:~/workspaces/catkin\_base\_ws/src$ wstool update

\[cartographer\] Fetching [https://github.com/googlecartographer/cartographer.git](https://github.com/googlecartographer/cartographer.git) \(version 1.0.0\) to /home/developer/workspaces/catkin\_base\_ws/src/cartographer  
fatal: could not create work tree dir '/home/developer/workspaces/catkin\_base\_ws/src/cartographer': Permission denied

This error is followed by similar ones for multiple packages.

Suggestions?
